select count(resell_no) from resell
and resell_name like '%${searchWord1}%' and resell_name like '%${searchWord2}%' and resell_name like '%${searchWord3}%'

select count(item_no) from item
and item_name like '%${searchWord1}%' and item_name like '%${searchWord2}%' and item_name like '%${searchWord3}%' and item_category = '${category}' or item_category = 0
and item_detail = '${detail}' and floor(item_detail/100)*100 = '${detail}'

select item_no, item_name, item_price, item_image, item_postdate from item
and item_name like '%${searchWord1}%' and item_name like '%${searchWord2}%' and item_name like '%${searchWord3}%' and item_category = '${category}' or item_category = 0
and item_detail = '${detail}' and floor(item_detail/100)*100 = '${detail}'
order by
item_name asc item_price asc item_postdate asc item_name desc item_price desc item_postdate desc
limit #{onePageRecord} offset ${offsetPoint};
